arts.sum: Both sides head into this fixture inside the bottom three of Serie A. Genoa beat Sassuolo 2-1 last weekend to record their first win in ten league games. Following Fiorentina's 2-1 defeat to Mainz i...

Genoa haven`t beaten Fiorentina at home since 1 September 2019, 2-1 in Serie A, thanks to goals from Zapata and Kouam√® for the hosts, Pulgar from the spot for the viola. The official head-to-head record between the two sides at Marassi stands at 59 matches, with 19 Genoa wins (latest 2-1, in Serie A 2019/20), 22 draws (latest 1-1, in Serie A 2020/21) and 18 Fiorentina successes (latest 1-0, in last year`s Serie A).

arts.ttl: Genoa vs. Fiorentina - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Serie A clash between Genoa and Fiorentina, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
